Title: Prohibits unregulated pregnancy centers from requiring clients to disclose certain information as a condition of service
Summary: Prohibits unregulated pregnancy centers from requiring clients, as a condition of service, or making it reasonably appear to be a condition of service, to disclose certain information relating to their medical history, sexual history, relationship to the other parent of the potential baby, or insurance or financial information.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to prohibiting unregulated pregnancy centers from requiring clients to disclose certain information as a condition of service
